captain.name: RD Gaikwad
captain.reason: Consistent performer with the bat, high average, and a reliable top-order batsman. Key to setting a good foundation.

fantasy_team.name: RD Gaikwad
fantasy_team.reason: Excellent average of 39.56 in 23 matches, top-order batter crucial for setting the tone.Wankhede stadium favours top order batter. Batting Friendly Pitch

fantasy_team.name: S Dube
fantasy_team.reason: Allrounder with a decent average of 31.23 and 13 wickets in 35 matches. Expected to contribute with both bat and ball.

fantasy_team.name: MS Dhoni
fantasy_team.reason: Experienced wicketkeeper-batsman with a solid average of 37.6 in 98 matches. His experience and finishing abilities are valuable.

fantasy_team.name: RA Jadeja
fantasy_team.reason: Quality all-rounder with 54 wickets and a decent batting average. Economical bowler and handy lower-order batsman.

fantasy_team.name: DP Conway
fantasy_team.reason: Solid average of 38.05 in 50 matches, provides stability at the top of the order. Wankhede Pitch will favour him.

fantasy_team.name: DL Chahar
fantasy_team.reason: Key bowler with 31 wickets in 25 matches, expected to take early wickets. Average Economy and Strike Rate

fantasy_team.name: M Pathirana
fantasy_team.reason: Promising bowler with a good strike rate of 11.4 and 30 wickets in 19 matches. Can be a wicket-taking option.

fantasy_team.name: HH Pandya
fantasy_team.reason: Key all-rounder for MI. Good record with both Bat and Bowl

fantasy_team.name: Ishan Kishan
fantasy_team.reason: Aggressive top-order batsman and wicketkeeper. Can provide quick runs and valuable points with dismissals.

fantasy_team.name: JJ Bumrah
fantasy_team.reason: Star bowler for MI with an excellent economy rate of 6.27 and 89 wickets in 70 matches. Expected to lead the bowling attack.

fantasy_team.name: D Madushanka
fantasy_team.reason: Showing great promise recently and picked up a lot of wickets

vice_captain.name: JJ Bumrah
vice_captain.reason: Star Bowler with good stats and crucial for wickets.
